trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_00<tab>The Dotharli warrior wants to see just how capable you are.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_02<tab>Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_03<tab>Obtain the small leather sack.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_04<tab>Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SEQ_05<tab>Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_02<tab>Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_03<tab>Obtain the small leather sack.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_04<tab>Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the Dotharli warrior.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_000<tab>You are a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> that has danced with death many a time. I can tell from your eyes.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_001<tab>We Dotharl respect all skilled warriors equally. Race does not come into it. I would very much like to witness your strength firsthand.

TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_002<tab>Should you be willing, I would have you participate in a trial. It should be no trouble for you─it is a test made for our tribe's youngest. You simply need head to the Dusk Throne and collect a small package.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_003<tab>Speak with me if you feel up to the challenge.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_010<tab>Ready to test your might? Head for the Dusk Throne's chest and bring back the sack I have placed there.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_011<tab>Deviate from the path and you shall fail the trial. You may attempt the test as many times as you like.

TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Head for the goal, taking care not to step outside of the designated path. Riding on a mount shall also cause you to fail the trial. Talk with the Dotharli warrior if you wish to reattempt the test.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_015<tab>Do not lose heart. You may attempt the trial as many times as you wish.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_016<tab>Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_100_020<tab>Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_020<tab>Skillfully done. Let us return to Dotharl Khaa.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_021<tab>The trial tests participants' bravery and their ability to cope with unforeseen obstacles. As I expected, it did not trouble you in the slightest.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_022<tab>Dotharl who complete the trial receive no rewards, but as you are an outsider, I will make an exception.
TEXT_STMBDZ610_02788_INSTRUCTOR02788_000_023<tab>I shall not forget you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You will always be welcome in Dotharl Khaa.
